full_text:
Re: Epstein Response
From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
To Charisma Edge
Date 2019/11/13 08:58
Subject: Re: Epstein Response
Attachments: TEXT.htm
great, thanks! I put the corrected Psy Alert memo in your box yesterday
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Chief Psychologist
U.S. Department of Justice/Federal Bureau of Prisons
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: (646) 836(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Fax: (646) 836-7712
E-mail: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov
If you are emailing about an inmate that may be at risk for suicide or self-harm, this is an emergency situation. Please make sure that you make contact (verbally) to Psychology Staff or the on-call psychologist. Please ensure to maintain constant visual observation of the inmate until formal steps can be taken to ensure his/her safety pending a formal assessment by a Psychologist.
>>> Charisma Edge 11/13/2019 8:55 AM >>>
FYI...AW portion for page 10 regarding SW cell assignment.
(b)(5)
Charisma Edge
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
Page 8738
DOJ-OGR-00025743

If you are emailing about an inmate that may be at risk for suicide or self-harm, this is an emergency situation. Please make sure that you make contact (verbally) to Psychology Staff or the on-call psychologist. Please ensure to maintain constant visual observation of the inmate until formal steps can be taken to ensure his/her safety pending a formal assessment by a Psychologist.

>>> Charisma Edge 11/13/2019 8:55 AM >>>
FYI...AW portion for page 10 regarding SW cell assignment.

Charisma Edge

150 Park Row

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email chain regarding the Epstein response. The email contains sensitive information related to inmate care and psychology services within the Federal Bureau of Prisons. Several sections are redacted, indicating potentially sensitive or personal information.
